meta.job_title: Assistant Professor in Child and Adolescent Psychiatry

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide health psychology services to children and families in Gastroenterology and Developmental Pediatrics.
Teaching and supervision responsibilities for residents, psychology interns, and other trainees.
Protected time for research and contributing to the Psychology Clinical Internship Training Program.
In-person clinical care at the Peoria campus for 2 days a month.

education_certification.credential: Doctoral degree in Psychology with completed health psychology postdoctoral fellowship.
Licensure in the State of Illinois.
